Name: De Duvel
Review Text: I've been coming to this place for a long time and the food is still great! The staff is super nice and the whole atmosphere in the restaurant is in overall really good. Name: De Duvel

Name: De Duvel
Review Text: Tasteful salty food and heavenly desserts. Service is quite rapid and waiters are really friendly. I appreciate the open kitchen, it s better to see how your food is prepared! Five stars at all!

Review Text:
I had tasty lunch there, having Cesar salad with chicken and draft beer. The location is great, near the Albert Cuypmark and Sarphatipark.
There's a lot of room inside and out, I've been lucky to grab a table outside where you can watch the passersby...

Name: De Duvel
